item.title: Are You Worse at Maths than a Cicada?
item.description: How reading manga led to me spending two days reading about insect breeding cycles.

item.title: Amogus Trick
item.description: A self-named method to determine whether a binary system consisting of equations of the form xi = yi and xi =/= yi is solvable in O(Î±(n) + m) time and O(n) memory, along with its applications in theoretical computer science problems
